venue.name: Boston Affilaite Marketing Networking Group @ iBasis in Burlington, MA

item.description:
----- Local Boston Affiliate Webmaster Publishers & Affiliate Marketing Managers Wanted! ------


The Boston Affiliate Marketing Roundtable is a group of Boston affiliate managers and affiliates that meet in a monthly open round table discussion to share tips, strategies and develop long term partnership with in the local Boston affiliate marketing community.

175+ Members and Growing

About 25 affiliate marketers attended the last affiliate marketing event. (Don't worry we reserved the main conference room for additional space!)

Check out a a review of the first meeting at http://marksguide.com...

See who attend the 3rd affiliate marketing event: http://www.freewebs.c...

We usually meet the 3rd Thursday of the month at 2:30pm.

Location: Hosted at iBasis / Pingo.com in Burlington, MA with a fridge full of drinks and snacks provided.

Agenda:

2:30 to 3:30pm Affiliate Marketing Roundtable Discussion.

* 2 Min Intro's: About your business, networking goals & funny personal story

3:30 to 3:45pm CJ Guest Speaker

Kim Riedell | Director, Advertiser Development-East
______________________________________
Commission Junction, a ValueClick Company
http://www.cj.com...

Topic: What's new at CJ & Advertiser Development Tips

3:45 to 4:00pm Guest Speaker

Martha Collins
Vp of Marketing/Advertising
helium.com

Beth
Advertising Manager
Helium, Inc.

Topic: Discuss this new venture & user generated content

Just Launched CJ program
http://affiliates.hel...

Check out this interesting start up demo about Helium Inc.
http://www.demo.com/d...


4:00 to 4:30 PM

This Month Tasks & Topics:

* Affiliate Incentives That Really Work
* Web 2.0 Affiliates & Top Social Deal BookMark Sites
* Social Media Affiliates in SecondLife to MySpace

4:30pm Flexible one on one time to set up individual networking opportunities with Am's to Affiliates or head home.

* Each attendee will be given a slot of time to share tips and find support from fellow members.
* The group also provides a monthly team check up of support to your monthly tasks and goals

Some attendees may want to arrange one on ones to meet up for lunch prior or coffee after or just go shopping at the Burlington Mall!

Contact Group organization

Brian Hawkins
Affilaite Marketing Manager
http://www.Pingo.com...
http://www.SuperAffil...
bhawkins /at/ pingo.com
781-505-7865

Go No Wheels? Carpool service can be arranged to be picked up and returned to alewife station. And don't worry, will get you all out before traffic piles up on 95, so that you can get home early as an extra perk for attending.

item.name: The 4th Boston Affiliate Marketing Networking Roundtable Meetup
